params.fids: Array of Farcaster IDs to credit for
params.tier: The tier ID to credit for all FIDs

params.fids: Array of Farcaster IDs to purchase for
params.forDays: Array of days corresponding to each FID (must match fids array length)
params.tier: The tier ID to purchase for all FIDs

returns._0: true if the contract has been migrated, false otherwise.
The next tier ID that will be used when creating a new tier

params.forDays: The number of days to calculate price for
params.tier: The tier ID to calculate price for

returns._0: The total price in the tier's payment token

params.fid: The Farcaster ID to purchase the tier for
params.forDays: The number of days to purchase the tier for

params.maxDays: Maximum number of days that can be purchased
params.minDays: Minimum number of days that can be purchased
params.paymentToken: The ERC20 token address to accept as payment
params.tokenPricePerDay: Price per day in the payment token
params.vault: Address where payments will be sent

params.to: Receiver address that will receive the full token balance

params.tier: The tier ID to get information for

returns._0: TierInfo struct containing all tier details

VERSION().notice: Contract version specified in the Farcaster protocol version scheme.

addGuardian(address).notice: Add an address as a guardian. Only callable by owner.

batchCreditTier(uint256,uint256[],uint25.notice: Credit a tier to multiple Farcaster IDs in a single transaction

batchPurchaseTier(uint256,uint256[],uint.notice: Purchase a tier for multiple Farcaster IDs in a single transaction

deactivateTier(uint256).notice: Deactivate a tier, preventing new purchases         Only callable by owner.

gracePeriod().notice: Period in seconds after migration during which admin can continue to call protected         migration functions. Admins can make corrections to the migrated data during the         grace period if necessary, but cannot make changes after it expires.

isMigrated().notice: Check if the contract has been migrated.

migrate().notice: Set the time of the migration and emit an event. Hubs will watch this event and         cut over to use this contract as their source of truth after this timestamp.         Only callable by the migrator.

migratedAt().notice: Timestamp at which data is migrated. Hubs will cut over to use this contract as their         source of truth after this timestamp.

nextTierId().notice: Get the next tier ID that will be assigned

pause().notice: Pause the contract. Only callable by owner or a guardian.

price(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculate the total price for purchasing a tier for a specific number of days

purchaseTier(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Purchase a tier for a specific Farcaster ID

removeGuardian(address).notice: Remove a guardian. Only callable by owner.

setMigrator(address).notice: Set the migrator address. Only callable by owner.

setTier(uint256,address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Update/create a user tier configuration         Only callable by owner.

sweepToken(address,address).notice: Rescue an ERC20 token accidentally sent to this contract

tierInfo(uint256).notice: Get information about a specific tier

unpause().notice: Unpause the contract. Only callable by owner.
